description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft SharePoint Server remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-30100):

1. Download the KB-5002602 update from the official Microsoft Update catalogue.
2. Install the update on affected SharePoint Server instances.
3. Restart the server to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The KB-5002602 update mitigates the remote code execution risks associated with the untrusted search path weakness (CWE-426).
- For manual installation, you can locate the update at: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/5002602.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are operating a version of SharePoint that is affected by this vulnerability.
- Backup your data before proceeding with the installation of any updates.
